title: Fashion entrepreneur Ronit Zilkha to host an evening at UWL (University of West London)
text: ( Source : University of West London ) UWL Visiting Professor Ronit Zilkha will be giving a free talk about her 25-year career in the fashion industry at Weston Hall , St. Mary's Road on Wednesday 28 October at 5.30pm. She will give unique
